version_description: - Swipe on your scan's preview to navigate between pages
- Swipe on your scan's preview to navigate between pages

• Allows selecting images from camera roll for OCR (text recognition)
• Allows selecting PDF from Files app for OCR (text recognition)
• Support for horizontal mode
• Various minor improvements

- Did you know that QuickScan is free and will remain as such? -
• Allows selecting images from camera roll for OCR (text recognition)
• Allows selecting PDF from Files app for OCR (text recognition)
• Support for horizontal mode
• Quality improvements
• Swipe left or right on scan preview to switch pages

- Did you know that QuickScan is 100% FREE and will remain as such? -
• Adds export to TXT file
• Adds OCR preview
• Adds homescreen shortcut for a quick scan
• Adds a tip jar to optionally thank me
• Quality improvements

QuickScan is 100% FREE (no ads, no IAP, no data collection) and will remain as such!
• Fixes potential bug with TXT export where pages would be reordered
• Quality improvements

• Added new languages for OCR (ENGLISH, GERMAN, FRENCH, SPANISH, ITALIAN, PORTUGUESE, CHINESE)
• iOS 14 compatibility
• New app design
• Improved settings interface
• App is FREE (optional tip via IAP)
